# Theme Parameter Dependencies

To enable semantic theming, theme parameters are organized as a hierarchy, where more specific parameters \(like the background of hovered emphasized buttons\) depend on more generic parameters \(like the background of emphasized buttons\).

Below is a list of parameter dependencies in different themes. Empty cells indicate that the parameter does not depend on another themable parameter in that theme – the value is either a constant \(like `#123456`\) or depends on a parameter that is treated like a constant \(like `sapPrimary2` in low-contrast themes\). Parameters that don't appear as entries of this list are not themable in any of those themes.

Refer to the [Parameter Explorer](https://sap.github.io/theming-base-content/docs/#/parameters) for an interactive way to explore parameters.
